scripts.start: npm run build:dll && NODE_ENV=develop node node_modules/jarb/webpack/devServer.js
scripts.build:docs: rimraf ./docs/** && jsdoc -c ./jsdocs.conf.json -u ./tutorials -t ./node_modules/ink-docstrap/template -R readme.md -r ./src -d docs  && npm run build:liveExample
scripts.karma: NODE_ENV=karma npm run lint && karma start
scripts.karma:watch: NODE_ENV=karma npm run lint && karma start --autoWatch=true --singleRun=false
scripts.cssnano: if test -e ./dist/bundle.css; then cssnano ./dist/bundle.css ./dist/bundle.css; else echo 'no css file to minify'; fi
scripts.build:dist:raw: NODE_ENV=production RAW_FILE=1 webpack --config=node_modules/jarb/webpack/webpackConfig.js && npm run cssnano
